mapper.select: /* run.getRunList */ SELECT A.RUN_ID , A.USR_ID , A.RUN_YMD , A.START_DT , A.END_DT , A.DISTANCE , A.DURATION , A.PACE , A.CALORIES_BURNED , A.ROUTE , A.NOTE , A.WEATHER , A.GEAR FROM T_RUN A WHERE A.USR_ID = #{usrId} ORDER BY A.RUN_YMD DESC
/* run.getCommonCode */ SELECT A.CODE_TYPE_ID AS CODE , B.CODE_NM AS CODE_NM FROM T_CODE_TYPE A , T_CODE B WHERE A.CODE_TYPE_ID = B.CODE_TYPE_ID AND A.CODE_TYPE_ID = #{codeTypeId}
